settings.subscribe_intro: Get the latest updates on new products and upcoming sales

meta.description: Supermarket Yellow is repsonsive mobile optimized theme. Outstanding features like sidebar left navigation, mega menu, multiple products by category block, custom banner images on various positions. Ideal for supermarket, large store, online shopping mall, grocery, selling electronics, hightech devices, furniture, home appliances, toys, automative and more. Homepage showing image carousel, bestselling, new products, featured products in tabs. Automatically shows products organized by category in each section on homepage. Supports categories vertical mega menu. Powerful Theme Editor to allow you quickly customize fonts, colors, configure various sections without coding required.

Ideal for supermarket, large store, online shopping mall, grocery, selling electronics, fashion, furniture, home appliances, toys, automative and more. This design is full responsive, clean, and ready for a wide range of online stores. Homepage showing image carousel, bestselling, new products, featured products in tabs. Automatically shows products organized by category in each section on homepage. Supports categories vertical mega menu. Layout is optimized for supermarket and large stores. Powerful Theme Editor to allow you quickly customize fonts, colors, configure various sections without coding required.

Ideal for supermarket, large store, online shopping mall, grocery, selling fashion, cosmetics & beauty, perfume, fragrance, and products for women. This design is full responsive, clean, and ready for a wide range of online stores. Homepage showing image carousel, bestselling, new products, featured products in tabs. Automatically shows products organized by category in each section on homepage. Supports categories vertical mega menu. Layout is optimized for supermarket and large stores. Powerful Theme Editor to allow you quickly customize fonts, colors, configure various sections without coding required.

Supermarket Modern is designed for online shopping mall selling electronics, gadgets, high-tech products, automotive car parts. Inspired from Amazon, best use for large stores. Responsive, mobile friendly design. Google rich snippets, AMP ready. Top features: mega menu, vertical categories menu, products by category, dynamic banners and content blocks, facebook chat box, instagram, brands list with a-z table, powerful Theme Editor allow to customize everything from fonts, colors, layouts.

settings.subscribe_intro: WE PRINT EVERYTHING! IF YOU DON'T SEE IT, ASK.
